description: The Perioeci class were second tier citizens of Sparta. Often sharing their harvest with Sparta and being called upon to fight despite less training and armor.
tooltip: Perioeci 5% faster gathering rate, 2% faster movement speed, 10% less train time and 20% less wood, but attack 10% slower, have 50% less armor and ranged units 25% less accurate. They don't get upgrades from forge
